sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { nanoid } from 'nanoid' import { AiOutlineDelete } from 'react-icons/ai' import './index.css' const App = () => { const Array = [ { id: nanoid(), name: 'Adil', gender: 'male' }, { id: nanoid(), name: 'Inam', gender: 'male' }, { id: nanoid(), name: 'Dawood', gender: 'male' }, { id: nanoid(), name: 'Neelam', gender: 'female' }, { id: nanoid(), name: 'Kiran', gender: 'female' }, ] const [isArray, setArray] = useState(Array) const [val, setVal] = useState({ fname:'', gender:'' }) const Input = (e) => { const {name,value} = e.target setVal ({ ...val, [name]:value}) } const Delete = (id) => { const delete_item = isArray.filter(item => item.id !== id) setArray(delete_item) } const Submit = e => { e.preventDefault() const obj = {id:nanoid(), name:val.fname, gender:val.gender} const newdata = [...isArray,obj] localStorage.setItem('to_do', JSON.stringify(newdata)) setArray(newdata) } return (
{ isArray.map((item) => ) }
Name Gender Delete
{item.name} {item.gender} < AiOutlineDelete className='icon' onClick={() => Delete(item.id)} />
) } export default App
